items.title: Correct link to contribution-guidelines repo
items.body: Incorrect link to contribution-guidelines repo in the dos-and-donts.md

items.title: Adapt the Style Guidelines to reflect the removal of 2 rules
items.body:
Small amendments / additions relating to the Markdown linting rules, both in the Style Guidelines:

- remove ref to 2 linting rules that we [don't want right now](https://github.com/SAP-docs/contribution-guidelines/commit/a3fab4a825fa226573c2c30557fd5814362e0c87)
- add reference to title case rule package

items.title: add meta issue template
items.body: We need an issue template to help folks raise questions or feedback about the process itself. The 'meta' issue has been created for this, and this is a template that uses that issue.

items.title: add markdown linting, using markdownlint
items.body:
- new workflow definition to run the checks
- new directory to hold markdownlint specific configuration
- rule configuration for the markdownlint tool
- a problem-matcher to associate markdownlint output with the content
- a new section in the Style Guidelines

See also https://qmacro.org/2021/05/14/notes-on-markdown-linting-part-2/.

items.title: add CODEOWNERS
items.body: To organise reviews by owners, focusing on the documentation content owner team for everything in `docs/`, and the admin team for everything else.

items.title: make minor improvements
items.body:
- delete exhortation to not remove labels (not needed)
- explain title case

items.title: add cond to check if on github.com
items.body: Similar to the check we have in the `sync-internal` workflow, we only want these jobs to run on the external repo so this PR adds appropriate condition expressions.

items.title: fix whitespace to address heading rendering
add gh auth login before pr edit
add pending reuse badge
items.body: Will need to register with Reuse service when public
